hero.title: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
hero.description: Full-stack developer with a growing focus on AI and Data Science. I design efficient interfaces, reliable backend systems, and explore machine-learning techniques to push digital products forward.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Based in Djibouti, I'm Mohamed Ali Youssouf, commonly known as Mohamed Chakkir. I earned my Computer Science degree in 2025, and my passion for web development began long before that, growing from early explorations in high school into a focus on modern full-stack development with React/Next.js and Express.js or Laravel.
about.paragraph2: I'm currently expanding into AI, machine learning, and cybersecurity as I prepare for postgraduate studies, and I bring strong multilingual communication skills in French, English, Arabic, and Somali as my native language.

contact.title: Let's stay in touch!
